@rhtyd a Jenkins job has been kicked to build packages. I'll keep you posted as I make progress.

So digging into this we run into the problem where we can't just enable a service in cloud-early-config since that doesn't make systemd pick it up.

We need to enable it during the first config, but also start it.

cloud-early-config is really becoming difficult to understand :)
I pushed more commits, it's now working for me. But more testing is needed. I only test basic networking
@wido I've resolved the conflicts. I am still trying to see if I can get the DB changes to be idempotently added. However the way Cloudstack reads the db script is really weird. Right now its a WIP
